com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.geoconstruction
Interface SpecialConstantAngle

All Known Implementing Classes:
AngleOf60Deg
public interface SpecialConstantAngle

Interface description:
Interface for special constant angles (like 30 degrees, or 60, 45, 90, 18, 36, 72 and others that can be constructed)

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

           Version number of interface in form xx.yy where xx is major version/release number and yy is minor release number.
